channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Derrick Van Orden targets Chip Roy over speakership vote: 'Chip is fighting to keep his brand marketable'
item.description: Rep. Derrick Van Orden criticizes Rep. Chip Roy for not getting on board to support House Speaker Mike Johnson to remain speaker.
